Text:
Yes! I think it's easier to write adventures on my laptop while using PDFs...

Do you have more Ars Magica PDFs?

jakeblues:

yes, i've got several gb-s of AM pdf.

my upload bandwith is relatively slow, maximum 25 k/s, so it will take a while...
